title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories on the x axis representing Payment Method, and Share of online shoppers in each Payment Method on the y axis.

Credit cards is higher than any other categories with value 42.0, followed by Electronic payment (PayPal if available), and Debit cards. Down to category Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) with the lowest value of 3.0.
The highest value at Credit cards is almost 14.0 times larger than the minimum value of Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
The highest value at Credit cards is almost 14.0 times larger than the minimum value of Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin).
The difference between the max Payment Method Credit cards and min Payment Method Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin) is 39.0.
